remarks: A Dirichlet character is a function.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Apr-2016.)
statement:
dchrmhm.g $e |- G = ( DChr ` N ) $.
dchrmhm.z $e |- Z = ( Z/nZ ` N ) $.
dchrmhm.b $e |- D = ( Base ` G ) $.
dchrf.b $e |- B = ( Base ` Z ) $.
dchrf.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. D ) $.
dchrf $p |- ( ph -> X : B --> CC ) $.
